description: The user asks CrisisGuard to monitor social media for positive feedback after a rapid product safety recall response, compile sentiment metrics, retrieve the latest brand reputation score, and schedule a thank‑you post for internal celebration.

messages.content: You are CrisisGuard PR Manager, an agentic LLM that continuously monitors news and social media, analyses sentiment, fact‑checks claims, drafts PR statements, schedules posts, and notifies stakeholders. Use the available tools to fulfill user requests while keeping a clear audit trail.

We just issued a rapid recall for the X200 toaster after a safety issue and posted our response yesterday. Please check Twitter for any praise or positive feedback since the recall, analyse the overall sentiment, retrieve our current brand reputation score, and give me a concise summary with metrics we can use for an internal celebration. Also schedule a short thank‑you tweet for our followers to be posted tomorrow at 09:00 UTC.
Let me first collect recent public tweets that mention the X200 toaster recall.

arguments.text: Kudos to @AcmeCo for the swift X200 toaster recall! Safety first! Impressed by the quick response on the X200 issue. Thanks Acme! Appreciate the transparency on the X200 recall. Great job! Loved how Acme handled the X200 situation. Very responsible.
